page.title: 17FISHING
page.content: There are three boats that fish in Burness:{THE VALHALLA,THE DILL}and{THE {MARY ELLEN. THE VALHALLA}is a big boat and is therefore able to go out to deeper waters.{THE DILL}is a small boat which fishes in shallow waters where the Lobsters are between April and August. After that they shed their shells and move into deeper water.{THE {MARY ELLEN}is a medium sized boat which fishes both in_shore and off_shore.All of the boats fish for Lobster and Crab.{THE MARY ELLEN}and {THE DILL}fish in Roos Wick because it's very tangly (plenty of seaweed - good Lobster ground) and is sheltered by the Holms of Ire.{THE VALHALLA fishes around Burness during the summer months but by the end of the year has covered most of the Lobster ground around the island.
